name: Dream Tower (itch)
description:
Dream Tower was developed for Games Plus Jam 3. 

 https://itch.io/jam/gamesplusjam3

Dream Tower is a local-multiplayer, 2D, one-button tower defense game based on rhythm accuracy where two friends escape to their imaginary realm to engage in a battle over control of the candy stash. Whoever destroys their opponent’s tower first wins.
